sourcesContent:
import React, { Fragment } from 'react'; const Terms = props => { return (

Terms and Conditions

Acceptance and Understanding

This website is the property of Que ride, with legal headquarters in Costa Rica. Please read these terms and conditions, which must be accepted when contracting services with Que ride. The returns of all reservations and payments that you contract with Que ride, made through any means, are subject to the following terms and conditions. You should not confirm any reservation through our site and/or contract a service unless you understand and agree to the following terms and conditions. Once we have received your payment we will understand that you have read and understood the terms and conditions that apply to said payments. If you have any questions, please contact us before making any payment and/or confirmation.

Prices and Currency

The prices reported on our website are expressed in Colones (unless otherwise stated) and include taxes.

Reservations and Payments

A deposit of an amount equivalent to 20% of the total reported price will be required to proceed to confirm your reservations. The amount of the final balance must be received by Que ride within 30 days prior to the arrival date at the starting point of your trip. If the payment of the final balance is not received within the indicated period, Que ride reserves the right to cancel the reservations. Those contracts made less than 30 days prior to the arrival date at the starting point of your trip, must be paid in full before the arrival date. You have the possibility to pay by credit card (Visa or MasterCard) or by bank transfer. Payments made by bank transfer do not receive any kind of surcharge. Que ride will take as payment for the contracted services, the amount effectively credited to your bank account free of transfer costs charged by issuing banks and correspondents. Any difference that may arise, it will be the client's responsibility to settle it through the available payment methods.

Reservation Modifications

In case of requesting a modification of a confirmed reservation, Que ride reserves the right to apply a minimum charge of 15,000 colones for administrative expenses.

Cancellations

In case you need to cancel a reservation that is confirmed more than 30 days prior to the arrival date, you are entitled to a refund of the amount paid less the sum of 15,000 colones as a cancellation charge. If you have paid less than 15,000 colones, we will not be entitled to any refund. In case you need to cancel a reservation that is confirmed between 30 and 21 days prior to the arrival date, the cancellation fee will be equivalent to 20% of the total price of the contracted services. In case you need to cancel a reservation that is confirmed between 20 and 10 days prior to the arrival date, the cancellation fee will be equivalent to 50% of the total price of the contracted services. In case you need to cancel a reservation that is confirmed within 9 days prior to the arrival date, the cancellation fee will be equivalent to 100% of the value of the contracted services.

Price variation

All prices are subject to changes and variations. In the event of an eventual fluctuation of prices, rates, taxes, or any other item that affects the part of the total price of the services contracted, Que ride undertakes to communicate a fluctuation variation as far in advance as possible. Changes and/or variations in prices caused by the reasons indicated in the preceding paragraph require payment by customers/passengers prior to the start of the contracted services.

Website

The information contained on our website is basically informative and illustrative of the services we offer, and may eventually contain errors or involuntary omissions, arising during the loading of such information. Que ride has no responsibility for such errors, omissions, or for the lack of updating of said information

Modifications and Cancellations

Due to the fact that in general reservations are made with a significant advance, eventually, the need could arise to make variations or modifications in the contracted services. In such a case you will be notified about such changes in price, route, itinerary, hotel, transportation, etc. If such variation or modification generates any inconvenience that makes the use of the contracted services impossible, you will not be obliged to go ahead with the reservation and you will be entitled to a refund of the amount paid. Que ride reserves the right to change and/or cancel already confirmed reservations due to issues related to security, adverse weather conditions, or other operational issues. You will be notified of such changes as far in advance as possible. If the changes in the already confirmed reservations generate any inconvenience that makes the use of the contracted services impossible, you will not be obliged to go ahead with the reservation and you will be entitled to a refund of the amount paid. Que ride, its employees, collaborators and/or associated companies will not be obliged to make any compensation when the modifications or cancellations are made for reasons of fortuitous event or force majeure (war, terrorism, state of siege, natural or nuclear disasters, epidemics, quarantines, customs or medical regulations, fires, labor disputes or strikes, etc.). Neither will there be any responsibility on the part of Que ride and/or its collaborators and/or employees and/or associated companies for problems caused by technical failures, delays or cancellation of flights, or for travel changes due to health or safety reasons of the customers/passengers.

Exit or entry taxes (exit tax or boarding fees)

The programs exclude exit taxes or international and/or domestic income. The international exit or entry tax must be paid before proceeding with the immigration and customs procedures. Please check the current rates with the operator with whom you contract international and/or domestic transport services.

Passports, visas, and other necessary documentation

It is the responsibility of the clients/passengers to have the correct and current travel documentation. That ride does not provide official information on visa requirements or documentation.

Problem and inconvenience notifications

If any problem or inconvenience arose during your trip,it is very important that you inform us immediately so that we can assist you with its resolution and in order to minimize possible adverse effects. In the event that for any reason you could not inform us of the surgical inconvenience, please inform us in writing within 30 days of arrival in your country, providing all the information you consider relevant. If possible, we will assist you in everything in our power to find a solution to the problem that has occurred.

); }; export default Terms;
